name: chartmogul
title: ChartMogul
description: A Raycast extension that gives you quick access to key business metrics from ChartMogul right from your command bar. Instantly view MRR, ARR, churn, customer counts, and more without leaving your workflow.
author: mattdelliott

commands.name: metrics
commands.title: Subscription Metrics
commands.subtitle: Get a snapshot of your most important subscription metrics
commands.description: See revenue, customer, and churn data all in one place. This gives you a high-level view of your SaaS performance in seconds.

commands.name: mrr-movements
commands.title: Recent MRR Movements
commands.subtitle: Stay on top of recent MRR movements
commands.description: Browse the latest customer actions like new signups, upgrades, and cancellations. Keep a finger on the pulse of your business in real time.

ai.instructions: All currency numbers are in cents. Don't display the calculation, just display the number.

evals.input: What was the churn rate for the last 30 days?
Tell me about the customer john@example.com

tools.name: list-customers
tools.title: List Customers
tools.description: List customers by data source uuid, status, or external ID.

tools.name: list-movements
tools.title: List Movements
tools.description: List movements by movement type, start date, and end date.

tools.name: list-data-sources
tools.title: List Data Sources
tools.description: List data sources for the configured account.

tools.name: list-customer-activities
tools.title: List Customer Activities
tools.description: List activities for a customer by uuid.

tools.name: retrieve-account-details
tools.title: Retrieve Account Details
tools.description: Retrieve account details for the configured account.

tools.name: metrics
tools.title: Metrics
tools.description: Retrieve subscription metrics, such as MRR, ARR, customer churn rate, LTV, ARPA, ASP, and more for a given date range.

tools.name: list-opportunities
tools.title: List Opportunities
tools.description: List opportunities by customer uuid, owner, pipeline, stage, or close date.

tools.name: list-call-logs
tools.title: List Notes & Call Logs
tools.description: List notes and call logs by customer uuid, type, or author email.

tools.name: list-contacts
tools.title: List Contacts
tools.description: List contacts by email or customer external ID.

tools.name: list-plans
tools.title: List Plans
tools.description: List plans by data source or external ID.

tools.name: list-tasks
tools.title: List Tasks
tools.description: List tasks by customer uuid, assignee, due date, close date, or completed.

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: The API key for your ChartMogul account. You can find it in the ChartMogul dashboard under Profile -> API Keys. It's highly recommended to use a dedicated READONLY API Key for this extension.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
